title: How to deploy the Outlook add-in for on-prem mailboxes
description: Login to your on-prem Exchange Admin Center and go to: Organization -> Add-ins -> Select the Add option, Select Add from URL

title: You cannot create or update inbound connectors in your organisation
description: On 1st January 2023 Microsoft implemented a change so that new Exchange Online tenants by default no longer allow creating inbound connectors.
